content.stem: (audio) What must visitors do when they arrive?

choices.A: Go directly to the top floor.
choices.B: Sign in at the front desk.

transcript.speaker: N
transcript.text: Welcome to River Tower Office Building. All visitors must sign in at the front desk and wear a visitor badge. Please wait in the lobby seats until your host comes to meet you. When you leave, return your badge to the desk.

content.rationale: Visitors need to sign in at reception.
